content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37.0, y=-85.0)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (39.0,-85.0), and (37.0,-85.0)
- Storage chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5), and (36.5,-86.5)
- Burner inserters at (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5) for coal movement
- All drills are operational and mining coal

### Iron/Copper Mining & Smelting at position(x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
Mining and smelting setup with:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Storage chest at (-27.5,-59.5) for ore collection
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5) and (-25.5,-58.5) moving materials
- Output storage chest at (-24.5,-58.5) containing processed plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10.0, y=-59.0)
Large iron mining operation with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), and (-6.0,-59.0)
- Storage chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), and (-5.5,-57.5)
- Connected by transport belts and inserters

### Smelting Array at position(x=0.0, y=0.0)
Large smelting facility consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), and (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), and (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), and (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow

### Power Generation Complex at position(x=4.5, y=20.5)
Power generation system with:
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Connected by pipe network
- Powers electric network with poles at (11.5,20.5), (7.5,20.5), (7.5,13.5), (10.5,12.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting from empty or non-existent storage
- Verify that the target chest contains the required items before attempting extraction
- Check if the chest exists at the specified location
- Ensure the chest has sufficient quantity of items being extracted

### Errors with inserter operations
- Inserters showing "waiting for source items" - Ensure input supply is constant
- Inserters showing "output blocked" - Clear destination or provide proper output storage
- When output is blocked by items on ground, ensure proper destination entity exists

### Resource management issues
- Some chests are reaching full capacity (iron ore at -5.5,-55.5) - Add more storage or improve throughput
- Boiler showing "out of fuel" warning - Establish consistent fuel supply system
